Package goal.tools.codeanalysis

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CodeAnalysisItem
    A SummaryItem stores one line that can be included in the code analysis overview.
    CodeAnalysisOverview
    Produces a string of text summarizing code analysis results.
    ModuleAnalysis
    Creates a code analysis for a module.
    PredicateAnalysis
    Performs a code analysis of the predicates in a GOAL agent program.
    ProgAnalysisResultGUI
    Shows results of GOAL program analysis in window.
    ProgramAnalysis
    Create an analysis of the contents of a GOAL program (#1186).
    RuleAnalysis
    Creates a static analysis of a program section.
    RuleSetAnalysis
    Analyzes a set of rules.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ItemType
